verses.verse: Let not <S%G3361><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> of you be <S%G1096><s%> teachers, <S%G1320><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> knowing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> we will receive <S%G2983><s%> heavier <S%G3173><s%> judgment. <S%G2917><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> in many things <S%G4183><s%> we all <S%G537><s%> stumble. <S%G4417><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> doesn't <S%G3756><s%> stumble <S%G4417><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> word, <S%G3056><s%> the same <S%G3778><s%> is a perfect <S%G5046><s%> man, <S%G435><s%> able <S%G1415><s%> to bridle <S%G5468><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>

Indeed, <S%G2400><s%> we put <S%G906><s%> bits <S%G5469><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the horses <S%G2462><s%>' mouths <S%G4750><s%> so that <S%G4314><s%> they <S%G846><s%> may obey <S%G3982><s%> us, <S%G2254><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> we guide <S%G3329><s%> their <S%G846><s%> whole <S%G3650><s%> body. <S%G4983><s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> the ships <S%G4143><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> though <S%G5607><s%> they are so big <S%G5082><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> are driven <S%G1643><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> fierce <S%G4642><s%> winds, <S%G417><s%> are yet guided <S%G3329><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> a very small <S%G1646><s%> rudder, <S%G4079><s%> wherever <S%G3699><s%> <S%G99999><s%> the pilot <S%G2116><s%> <S%G3730><s%> desires. <S%G1014><s%>

So <S%G3779><s%> the tongue <S%G1100><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> a little <S%G3398><s%> member, <S%G3196><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> boasts great things. <S%G3166><s%> See <S%G2400><s%> how a small <S%G3641><s%> fire <S%G4442><s%> can spread <S%G381><s%> to a large <S%G2245><s%> forest! <S%G5208><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> the tongue <S%G1100><s%> is <S%G2525><s%> a fire. <S%G4442><s%> The world <S%G2889><s%> of iniquity <S%G93><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> members <S%G3196><s%> <S%G3779><s%> is <S%G2525><s%> the tongue, <S%G1100><s%> which defiles <S%G4695><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> body, <S%G4983><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sets on fire <S%G5394><s%> the course <S%G5164><s%> of nature, <S%G1078><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> is set on fire <S%G5394><s%> by Gehenna. <S%G1067><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> kind <S%G5449><s%> of animal, <S%G5037><s%> <S%G2532><s%> bird, <S%G4071><s%> <S%G5037><s%> creeping thing, <S%G2062><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> thing in the sea, <S%G1724><s%> is tamed, <S%G1150><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> has been tamed <S%G1150><s%> by mankind. <S%G5449><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> nobody <S%G3762><s%> <S%G444><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> tame <S%G1150><s%> the tongue. <S%G1100><s%> It is a restless <S%G183><s%> evil, <S%G2556><s%> full <S%G3324><s%> of deadly <S%G2287><s%> poison. <S%G2447><s%>

With <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%> it <S%G846><s%> we <S%G2127><s%> bless our God <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> it <S%G846><s%> we <S%G2672><s%> curse men, <S%G444><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> are made <S%G1096><s%> in the image <S%G3669><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Out of <S%G1537><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> comes <S%G1831><s%> forth blessing <S%G2129><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> cursing. <S%G2671><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> ought <S%G5534><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to be <S%G1096><s%> so. <S%G3779><s%>
Does <S%G3385><s%> a spring <S%G4077><s%> send out <S%G1032><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> opening <S%G3692><s%> fresh <S%G1099><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> bitter water? <S%G4089><s%>

Can <S%G1410><s%> a fig tree, <S%G4808><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> yield <S%G4160><s%> olives, <S%G2228><s%> or a vine <S%G288><s%> figs? <S%G4810><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> spring <S%G4077><s%> yields <S%G4160><s%> both salt <S%G252><s%> water <S%G5204><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> fresh <S%G1099><s%> water. <S%G5204><s%>

Who <S%G5101><s%> is wise and <S%G2532><s%> understanding <S%G1990><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you? <S%G5213><s%> Let him show <S%G1166><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> conduct <S%G391><s%> that his <S%G846><s%> deeds <S%G2041><s%> are done in <S%G1722><s%> gentleness <S%G4240><s%> of wisdom. <S%G4678><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> bitter <S%G4089><s%> jealousy <S%G2205><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> selfish ambition <S%G2052><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> heart, <S%G2588><s%> don't <S%G3361><s%> boast <S%G2620><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> don't <S%G5574><s%> lie against <S%G2596><s%> the truth. <S%G225><s%>

This <S%G3778><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> that which comes down <S%G2718><s%> from above, <S%G509><s%> but <S%G235><s%> is earthly, <S%G1919><s%> sensual, <S%G5591><s%> and demonic. <S%G1141><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> jealousy <S%G2205><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> selfish ambition <S%G2052><s%> are, <S%G1563><s%> there is confusion <S%G181><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> evil <S%G5337><s%> deed. <S%G4229><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> that is <S%G2076><s%> from above <S%G509><s%> is first <S%G4412><s%> <S%G99999><s%> pure, <S%G53><s%> then <S%G1899><s%> peaceful, <S%G1516><s%> gentle, <S%G1933><s%> reasonable, <S%G2138><s%> full <S%G3324><s%> of mercy <S%G1656><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> good <S%G18><s%> fruits, <S%G2590><s%> without partiality, <S%G87><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> without hypocrisy. <S%G505><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> the fruit <S%G2590><s%> of righteousness <S%G1343><s%> is sown <S%G4687><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> by those <S%G3588><s%> who make <S%G4160><s%> peace. <S%G1515><s%>
